title: New Stolen vehicle VW Split / Bay & Panel Van website

posts.content:
Hello everyone!

I’ve just setup a new website for stolen VW Split Screen / Bay Windows & Panel Vans at www.stolenvwsplitbuses.co.uk/ it’s free to use.

It’s not a forum or a website where you register or login and do stuff yourself, that’s where I come in. The site is a totally dedicated website for Stolen Split / Bays & Panel Van and is solely run by myself.

Please follow us on Twitter & Facebook and keep upto date on what happening to some of your follow enthusiasts treasured vehicles. So if you know anybody whom as had the Split / Bay or Panel Van stolen, then please get in touch with them and tell them to visit the website.

Hope this is of some use to you all, please pass the word on about my website.


Wishing you all the very best

Jeff Riva

Please note:

Jeff from Stolen Splits & Bays

After careful consideration I have decided to close down my website www.stolenvwsplitbuses.co.uk/ reason being is that I don’t really need or use it any more. As we are steadily getting more & more VW enthusiasts following us on Facebook & on Twitter, so I felt I didn’t need the website anymore.

Also with us being registered with lots of different VW forums around the country, then we are definitely getting the word out with regards to Stolen VW Splits & Bays.

So absolutely no change with us on Facebook or Twitter - we can be found on Facebook under Stolen Splits & on Twitter under stolen57

Cheers Jeff
